Package com.example.projectcurie

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AddAnswerFragment.AddAnswerDialogFragmentListener
    The activity which implements this interface agrees to post a new answer to the database given a string returned from this DialogFragment.
    AddCommentFragment.AddCommentDialogFragmentListener
    The activity which implements this interface agrees to post a new question to the database given a string returned from this DialogFragment.
    BinomialTrialFragment.BinomialTrialFragmentInteractionListener
    Implemented by this Fragment's parent Activity to enable submitting new trials to the FireStore database and registering bar codes.
    CountTrialFragment.CountTrialFragmentInteractionListener
    Implemented by this Fragment's parent Activity to enable submitting new trials to the FireStore database and registering bar codes.
    EditUserDialogFragment.EditUserCallbackListener
    Callback interface for refreshing the UI of the user profile activity upon editing the user's information
    IntegerCountTrialFragment.IntegerCountTrialFragmentInteractionListener
    Implemented by this Fragment's parent Activity to enable submitting new trials to the FireStore database and registering bar codes.
    MeasurementTrialFragment.MeasurementTrialFragmentInteractionListener
    Implemented by this Fragment's parent Activity to enable submitting new trials to the FireStore database and registering bar codes.
    SearchExperimentFragment.SearchExperimentFragmentInteractionListener
    Implemented by this Fragment's parent Activity to conduct a database search for experiments whose searchable fields match some given keywords.
    SearchUserFragment.SearchUserFragmentInteractionListener
    Implemented by this Fragment's parent Activity to conduct a database search of a given user and display the results.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAnswerFragment
    This class implements the fragment for inputting a new answer to a question.
    AddCommentFragment
    This class implements the Dialog Fragment for adding a new question to the FireStore database.
    AnswerListActivity
    This class implements the activity to see list of answers attached to a question, and button to add answer to question.
    App
    Provides a global state for the application.
    BinomialTrial
    Stores the results of a single binomial trial.
    BinomialTrialFragment
    This Fragment provides a UI interface for submitting a binomial trial to an experiment which requires it.
    Comment
    Represents a single question or answer posted to an experiment.
    CommentController
    Use this class to dynamically render a Comment List View.
    CommentFetcher
    Monitors a collection of questions/answers stored in the FireStore database for updates in their underlying data.
    CountTrial
    This class stores the results of a single count trial.
    CountTrialFragment
    This Fragment provides a UI interface for submitting a count trial to an experiment which requires it.
    EditUserDialogFragment
    This DialogFragment allows a user to enter new values for the editable fields of their profile.
    Experiment
    This class represents a database instance of a single experiment.
    ExperimentArrayAdapter
    A custom array adapter for display a list view of Experiments.
    ExperimentCommentsFragment
    This class represents the comments associated with an experiment in a tab.
    ExperimentDataFragment
    This class currently doesn't do anything interesting.
    ExperimentListActivity
    This class implements an activity for presenting a list view of experiments.
    ExperimentOverviewActivity
    This class implements a tabbed activity for viewing and commenting on an experiment.
    ExperimentOverviewFragment
    This class implements the experiment overview tab of the Experiment Overview activity.
    ExperimentStatistics
    This class stores all trials associated with a given experiment and provides methods for extracting common statistics from those trials.
    IntegerCountTrial
    This class stores the results of a single integer count trial.
    IntegerCountTrialFragment
    This Fragment provides a UI interface for submitting an Integer Count trial to an experiment which requires it.
    MainActivity
    This activity provides the main menu by which the user will interact with the app.
    MapsActivity
    This class implements an activity for implementing Google Maps for Geolocation purposes.
    MeasurementTrial
    This class stores the results of a single measurement trial.
    MeasurementTrialFragment
    This Fragment provides a UI interface for submitting a measurement trial to an experiment which requires it.
    NameGenerator
    Class for generating unique random user names.
    NewExperimentActivity
    This class implements the activity for creating a new experiment.
    ObjectSerializer
    Serializes an object into a string.
    SearchExperimentFragment
    This Dialog Fragment presents the user with a simple text bar into which they can enter one or more keywords by which to search for matching experiments.
    SearchUserFragment
    This class implements the fragment for taking in a username to be searched.
    SubmitTrialActivity
    This activity allows the user to submit a trial results to a given experiment.
    Trial
    This class represents an experiment trial and is the base class from which all other trials inherit.
    TrialController
    Provides a link between the database and UI.
    User
    This class represents a user of the app.
    UserProfileActivity
    This class implements an activity for presenting the user profile.
    UserSearchProfileActivity
    This class implements the activity for presenting the profile of the searched user.
    WelcomeActivity
